name: 연애제한구역
summary:
才进公司一年的底层职员李恩谦 很可爱，爱撒娇，人际关系非常好 但是可能太看脸的缘故，总是遇见一些渣男。 在恩谦的理想型，新组长出现之前一切还都很好 烦人的组长，有机会一定要戳穿他的真面目。

Lee Eun-gyeom is your typical office worker. A newbie at his workplace, he's friendly and sociable. However, when it comes to love and relationships, he has the most rotten luck. 

Enter Han Jihyuk, the handsome team manager who's totally Eun-gyeom's type! But wait a second... Is this demon of a manager out to get him? His arrival is about to send Eun-gyeom through a roller coaster of emotions!
info:
• 中文名: 恋爱限制区
  • 话数: 30（第一季）
  • 连载杂志: RIDIBOOKS
  • 别名: 恋爱禁区
  • 别名: Love Restriction Zone
  • 发售日: 2019
  • 作者: 단비
  • 连载网站: https://ridibooks.com/books/3964000001
